alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:22AM EST until March 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Erie, Lorain and Huron counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The bulk of the snow will fall through 1 PM when snow rates can exceed half an inch per hour. There will be a lull in the snow around midday as temperatures warm into the mid 30s which will allow conditions to significantly improve. Falling temperatures and lake enhanced snow showers will lead to slick travel and walking conditions returning during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
